item.title: One Pager
item.description: The Problem How do we communicate clearly in a business or technological setting? The Solution Write a One Pager. To write a good One Pager: Write it in one page. Put a date at the top, so people know if itâ€™s fresh or stale. Write a clear, short title. Write a single sentence problem description in the form of a question. Write the smallest solution description possible, while being complete and clear.
